Reviews.Title: Good Camera-fairly complete package
Reviews.Author: Michael McCarthy
Reviews.Content: Great so far.  The camera has more features than I have had a chance to learn or try yet, but I am very impressed with it.  The included accessories are cheap but functional.  Don't forget to add a filter, which is not included.  But they have thought of everything else.

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-135mm F3.5-5.6 IS
Includes: Transcend 32 GB SDHC Class 10 Flash Memory Card, Ultra High Quality Battery Pack for Canon EOS,
Opteka RC-4 Wireless Remote Control for Canon, Opteka OPT540 54" Compact Professional Photo / Video Tripod,  HDMI Cable,
Opteka Microfiber Deluxe Photo/Video Camera Gadget Bag for Digital Cameras & Camcorders, Opteka Digital Camera / Camcorder Lens Cleaning Kit,
Tabletop Tripod, & LCD Screen Protectors, Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Photography in Snap DVD, 47 Street Photo Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D 20.2 MP Digital SLR Camera with Dual Pixel CMOS AF and EF-S 18-135mm F3.5-5.6 IS STM Starter Kit with 32GB Memory Card, Spare Battery + More!
